string.text: You're useless, Marked One, totally useless. Don't expect us to thank you - nothing to thank you for!
Not bad, stalker - you shot yourself a few mutants but you ain't all that quick on the draw, are you? If you wanna pass you'll have to cough up some cash.
Excellent Marked One, you really helped us out there. Let's say that was payment for your pass. Go on to the Bar.
Let them come closer so nobody can escape. I'll shoot first, you follow my lead.
Stalker, you're on Duty territory. Any aggression will be punished.
Attention!! This is the Duty checkpoint. A wave of mutants is moving from the Dark Valley to the Bar. Anyone who helps us shoot the monsters will not regret it.
Stalker, you're on Duty territory. Mess around and you'll be drinking your food through a straw for the rest of your life.
Well done guys, we got 'em. You lads chill out and you come over here. Let's have a chat.

Hello people, this is the commander of a neutral party. We knocked the bandits out from the abandoned vehicle park but they will probably try to retake it. We're low on numbers so if you wanna help we'll save a spot for you.
